statements: SELECT * FROM coverage_data;
SELECT id, region FROM coverage_data WHERE network_type = '4G';
SELECT coverage_area FROM coverage_data WHERE data_speed > 100;
SELECT id, data_speed FROM coverage_data ORDER BY data_speed DESC;
SELECT region, network_type, coverage_area FROM coverage_data WHERE region LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM coverage_data WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY data_speed DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, region, network_type FROM coverage_data WHERE coverage_area IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, region, data_speed FROM coverage_data WHERE data_speed > 50 AND network_type = '4G' ORDER BY region ASC,data_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM coverage_data WHERE data_speed BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT id, region, network_type, ST_AsText(coverage_area) AS coverage_area_text FROM coverage_data WHERE network_type = '5G' ORDER BY region,data_speed ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM network_coverage;
SELECT id, location, coverage_area FROM network_coverage;
SELECT location, coverage_area FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_area > 100;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_planning;
SELECT location, planned_infrastructure FROM infrastructure_planning WHERE planned_infrastructure = 'fiber optic';
SELECT * FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_area > 50 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_planning WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(3.5 4.7)')) < 10;
SELECT id, coverage_area FROM network_coverage WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND coverage_area > 30 ORDER BY coverage_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_planning WHERE planned_infrastructure LIKE '%fiber%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, planned_infrastructure FROM infrastructure_planning WHERE id > 2 AND id < 6 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM network_coverage;
SELECT id, area_name FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_status = true;
SELECT city_name, infrastructure_type FROM network_infrastructure ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT equipment_count, city_name FROM network_infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type = 'Tower';
SELECT * FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_status = true ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, infrastructure_type, equipment_count FROM network_infrastructure WHERE equipment_count > 100 ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT id, location_name, ST_AsText(coverage_area_polygon) FROM geospatial_data WHERE longitude < 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT area_name, coverage_range FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_range BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1 ORDER BY coverage_range ASC, area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type LIKE '%fiber%' AND city_name LIKE 'L%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure;
SELECT plan_name, estimated_cost FROM network_planning;
SELECT area_name, coverage_type FROM network_coverage ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT coverage_range, area_name FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_range > 500 ORDER BY coverage_range ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 20.0 AND 30.0;
SELECT * FROM network_coverage ORDER BY coverage_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, coverage_type FROM network_coverage WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%' AND coverage_range > 100;
SELECT infrastructure_type, installation_date FROM network_infrastructure WHERE coverage_id IN (SELECT coverage_id FROM network_coverage WHERE coverage_type = '4G');
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM network_planning WHERE estimated_cost > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE coverage_id = (SELECT MAX(coverage_id) FROM network_coverage);
SELECT * FROM network_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_name, is_active FROM network_nodes WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT plan_name, planned_date, node_name FROM infra_planning JOIN network_nodes ON infra_planning.planned_node_id = network_nodes.node_id;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_type, ST_AsText(coverage_geometry) FROM coverage_area;
SELECT area_name, area_type FROM coverage_area;
SELECT node_name, location_point FROM network_nodes WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT plan_name, planned_date FROM infra_planning WHERE planned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC, device_name ASC;
SELECT performance_id, data_speed, signal_strength, performance_date FROM network_performance WHERE data_speed > 100 AND signal_strength < 50 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
